entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who asks Hagrid questions about their encounter with the giants.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has experience dealing with giants.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who gave Hagrid instructions on how to deal with the giants.

entities.name: karkus
entities.description: Karkus is a giant whom Hagrid and his group encountered.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who corrects Ron and Harry about the Gubraithian fire.

entities.name: gubraithian fire
entities.description: Gubraithian fire is an everlasting fire that Hagrid's group gave to Karkus as a gift.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a teacher at Hogwarts who has mentioned the Gubraithian fire in class.

relationships.description: Hagrid and his group gave Karkus a branch of Gubraithian fire as a gift.
Dumbledore instructed Hagrid on how to deal with the giants.
